sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="x_snc_plant_mgmt_tasks"> <x_snc_plant_mgmt_tasks action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <activity_due/> <additional_assignee_list/> <approval>not requested</approval> <approval_history/> <approval_set/> <assigned_to/> <assignment_group/> <business_duration/> <business_service/> <calendar_duration/> <close_notes/> <closed_at/> <closed_by/> <cmdb_ci/> <comments/> <comments_and_work_notes/> <company/> <contact_type/> <contract/> <correlation_display/> <correlation_id/> <delivery_plan/> <delivery_task/> <description>To ensure a healthy Holy Basil (Tulsi) plant, use well-draining soil enriched with organic matter, such as compost or well-rotted manure. Fertilize every 4-6 weeks during the growing season with a balanced organic fertilizer, ideally with a higher nitrogen content to promote lush leaf growth. Apply the fertilizer around the base of the plant, avoiding direct contact with the stems, and water afterward to enhance nutrient absorption. Keep an eye out for yellowing leaves or stunted growth, which may indicate nutrient deficiencies.</description> <due_date/> <escalation>0</escalation> <expected_start/> <follow_up/> <group_list/> <impact>3</impact> <knowledge>false</knowledge> <location/> <made_sla>true</made_sla> <maintenance_task>fertilize</maintenance_task> <number>TASK0020111</number> <opened_at>2024-10-26 14:59:27</opened_at> <opened_by display_value="System Administrator">6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441</opened_by> <order/> <parent/> <plant display_value="Holy Basil (Tulsi)">b00cd408c3691210482770edd4013193</plant> <priority>4</priority> <reassignment_count>0</reassignment_count> <rejection_goto/> <route_reason/> <service_offering/> <short_description>Fertilization tips for Tulsi</short_description> <sla_due/> <state>2</state> <sys_class_name>x_snc_plant_mgmt_tasks</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-10-26 15:01:03</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>77cd562cc3e51210482770edd40131fb</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-10-26 15:01:45</sys_updated_on> <task_effective_number>TASK0020111</task_effective_number> <time_worked/> <universal_request/> <upon_approval>proceed</upon_approval> <upon_reject>cancel</upon_reject> <urgency>3</urgency> <user_input/> <variables/> <watch_list/> <wf_activity/> <work_end/> <work_notes/> <work_notes_list/> <work_start/> </x_snc_plant_mgmt_tasks> </record_update>
